entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as a school professor who might have gotten rid of the horse. He shares classes with Harry.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is mentioned as being too tipsy to recognize Harry.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is mentioned as the subject of Professor Trelawney's criticisms.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who shares classes with Professor Dumbledore and is being talked to by Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is talking to Harry about whether she plans to tell Ron that she interfered at Keeper tryouts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the person Hermione might tell about her interference at Keeper tryouts.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is mentioned as someone Hermione asked out.

entities.name: horse
entities.description: A horse is mentioned as something Professor Dumbledore might have gotten rid of.

relationships.description: Harry shares classes with Professor Dumbledore.
Professor Trelawney criticizes Firenze under the cover of her furious criticisms.
Harry is talking to Hermione about whether she plans to tell Ron that she interfered at Keeper tryouts.
Hermione might tell Ron about her interference at Keeper tryouts.
Harry accuses Hermione of interfering at Keeper tryouts.
